title: Airport Express Lima: Miraflores to Lima Airport

Comfortable bus ride

Sep 2025 • Family
This bus runs from 7 am to 10 pm daily making stops at the marriot and the miraflores tourist center fare is inexpensive and ride is very comfortable.
Written October 1, 2025

Lima, Peru1 contribution

Excellent service

Jul 2025 • Solo
It's an A1 service, with comfortable seats, friendly staff, air conditioning, free Wi-Fi, and always on time. I will definitely continue traveling with Airport Express because I feel protected arriving at my destination with them. Special kudos to guide Cesar Hernandez for his attentiveness.
Written July 27, 2025
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.
Jamesvvang
New York109 contributions

Stay Away! Miss Your Flight!

Jul 2025 • Solo
Horrible! Nightmare! Almost missed my international flight.

The bus never arrived at the Miraflores stop because the bus was full/at capacity. It was supposed to stop in Miraflores at 8:05pm. At 8:20pm, I checked-in with the representatives at the Tourist Center and they couldn't do anything about it. There was another passenger who had been waiting for the bus too. I ended up paying 3x the price and took the other passenger that was waiting to the airport with me. The tourist center representative asked me for the Uber receipt and Airport Express Lima refuses to reimburse for their mistake. Unethical company that doesn't care if you miss your flight.
Written July 24, 2025
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Exemplary care and service

Apr 2025 • Solo
I had an excellent experience with the Airport Express shuttle. The seats were comfortable and the ride fast and safe. I felt calm throughout the trip, especially because of the strict security measures they implemented.

I highlight the attention of Juan Barzola, who was very professional and friendly, providing personalized attention and helping me with the wifi on board. His treatment made the trip much more pleasant.

I definitely recommend Airport Express for its comfort, security and excellent customer service, especially thanks to Juan.
